feed.title: Tag: music | thecave | Kirby Turner's Blog

entry.description: Jane’s Addiction on the sound system. Hunting Hitler on the TV behind the bar. I think I just found my new favorite dive bar.
entry.content:
Jane’s Addiction on the sound system. Hunting Hitler on the TV behind the bar. I think I just found my new favorite dive bar.

Oh wait. The bartender just put on Justin Timberlake. Time to look for another place.

entry.description: The kid and I played Battle of the Music tonight. His pick: Twenty One Pilots. My pick: Godzilla. The winner: Meatwad’s Frosty the Red-Nosed Snowman.
entry.content: The kid and I played Battle of the Music tonight. His pick: Twenty One Pilots. My pick: Godzilla. The winner: Meatwad’s Frosty the Red-Nosed Snowman.

entry.description: Having a chilled night wishing for some Deep Purple. Then Hush comes on. Perfect evening.
entry.content: Having a chilled night wishing for some Deep Purple. Then Hush comes on. Perfect evening.

entry.description: Count Basie Orchestra at Music in the Meadows.
entry.content: Count Basie Orchestra at Music in the Meadows.

entry.title: Wiring Code to Zeppelin
entry.description: Writing code while listening to Led Zeppelin puts me into the zone especially when I’m making bug fixes.
entry.content: Writing code while listening to Led Zeppelin puts me into the zone especially when I’m making bug fixes.
